A group of about 100 Muslim refugees petitioned the UK battalion
for asylum in Vitez at this time.   They were refused entry to the
UNPROFOR compound, but were turned over to UN relief authorities
14
in Zenica a few days later.   Reuters, “ Moslem Troops Seek UN Protec
tion as Croats Advance " by Kurt Schork , 9 September 1993 .
